connectorKey.title: App Key
connectorKey.description: Key obtained from the blinds app. Go to the About page and tap the screen five times.

hubIps.title: Hub / Wifi Device IPs
hubIps.description: If UDP multicast auto-discovery is not working, specify the IPs of each hub or WiFi motor device here.

reverseDirection.title: Reverse Direction
reverseDirection.description: If some of your devices move in the opposite of the expected direction, add their Serial Numbers here.

invertReverseList.title: Reverse All Except Listed Devices
invertReverseList.description: Inverts the behaviour of the list above by reversing all devices *except* the ones in the list.

refreshIntervalMs.title: Refresh Interval
refreshIntervalMs.description: Interval in milliseconds between device status refreshes

maxRetries.title: Max Request Retries
maxRetries.description: Max number of times to retry a failed request to the hub
